recovery.title: Reboot to Recovery
recovery.description: Press and hold the volume up and power buttons until the phone reboots.

bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: Press and hold the volume down and power buttons until the phone reboots.

confirm_model.title: Confirm your model
confirm_model.description: Please confirm that your device is a Huawei Nexus 6P (angler). The LG Nexus 6 (shamu) is not compatible!

confirm_vendorimage.title: Confirm Android version
confirm_vendorimage.description: Please reset your device to stock Android 7.1.2 - Critical vendor files are otherwise missing!

confirm_formatting.title: Reformat all partitions with TWRP
confirm_formatting.description: Please install TWRP recovery and format all partitions due to the encryption applied by the stock ROM!

boot.title: Reboot the device
boot.description: Hold the power button to turn your device completely off, release it for a few seconds, then hold it down again until the device boots.
